name: creatorflow-ui
description: CreatorFlow UI Redesign - Build tools for CSS/JS optimization

scripts.build:css: postcss static/css/sidebar-redesign.css -o static/css/sidebar-redesign.prefixed.css && cssnano static/css/sidebar-redesign.prefixed.css static/css/sidebar-redesign.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.test:performance: echo 'Run: npm run build && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput'
